'''Anne Besson''' is a French researcher and professor of general and comparative literature at the University of Artois. She is known for her work on genre literature, science fiction and fantasy and, more generally, literatures of the imaginary, in which she is a specialist.

== Bibliography ==

* [[2004]]: ''D'Asimov à Tolkien: Cycles et séries dans la littérature de genre'', CNRS éditions, 28 octobre 2004, p. 250.

* [[2007]]: ''Fantasy, le merveilleux médiéval aujourd’hui'', éd. Anne Besson and Myriam White-Le Goff, Paris, Bragelonne, «Essais», 2007.
